title: "Stranded for years in the void"
body:
What did you eat?

Also nice makeup, where did you get that?

replies.body:
> Also nice makeup, where did you get that?

Don't underestimate Amazon's drones.

The answer to both questions is "Purple Goop", probably.

The difference between cosmetic Goop and edible Goop probably made for a difficult first few months.

The flesh of voidborn probably. Likely had to build up an immunity to getting irradiated/poisoned by it.

Probably voidborn entrails. Makes for a good detterent. Or maybe it'd just attract the bigger ones. Dunno.

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-20T21:46:26.199+0000)
>
> The flesh of voidborn probably. Likely had to build up an immunity to getting irradiated/poisoned by it.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/metroid/images/7/78/PhazonVomit.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140817015143
The Void is one hell of a drug. Don't do The Void, kids.
Almost as bad as Darkin.
i cant help but think void creatures are toxic and eating them would be unwise.
They are, it was confirmed as such in Scourge of the Desert. Voidborn were shown to be deadly, poisonous to eat, and would disintegrate in minutes after death.
so what is there to eat in to void for a human?
Probably not much unless the suit sustains her and consumes things to help her out.
maybe she ate those little crab things  from malz w but i do not know how she got water or  if the void even  have access to water

> [{quoted}](name=CrazyBigfoot28,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-02-20T23:08:52.334+0000)
>
> maybe she ate those little crab things that malz has but i do not know how she got water or  even if the void have access to water

now you're asking the proper questions you should be asking about lore
And why does the void-suit that protected you from horrors beyond reckoning have conveniently have an open chest to reveal your cleavage?

> [{quoted}](name=Ifneth,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-02-21T02:48:49.296+0000)
>
> And why does the void-suit that protected you from horrors beyond reckoning have conveniently have an open chest to reveal your cleavage?

https://i.imgur.com/HEByfQ1.png

What did you say?

That is her "battle mode", protecting her chest and face.

Okay but in an alien horror dimension with no other people, why does she feel the need to pull her suit all the way down to her low cleavage while not in combat? Its almost like she is trying to show off her chest, but to whom?
It might get hot in the void, especially with full-body armor on after a potentially hard day of voidborn-slaying.

Is there **oxygen** in the void?


Malzahar's voidling can't survive long out of the void, which is either due to oxygen or atmospheric pressure

Kassadin lost the ability to breathe oxygen, so clearly there's something else he breathed in there. 

So how did she breathe? She would literally have to adapt breathing the second she even went into the void, and if she came out how isn't she similar to kassadin where suddenly "she can breath both void and oxygen without concern".
I don't think you need oxygen to breathe in the Void. It isn't concerned with such rules. Being able to breathe when you come back out is the hard part.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=000600000001,timestamp=2018-02-21T06:43:12.156+0000)
>
> Okay but in an alien horror dimension with no other people, why does she feel the need to pull her suit all the way down to her low cleavage while not in combat? Its almost like she is trying to show off her chest, but to whom?

Maybe she never did that in the Void? Or maybe she did it to remember that she is a human? Who knows.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=000600000001,timestamp=2018-02-21T06:43:12.156+0000)
>
> Okay but in an alien horror dimension with no other people, why does she feel the need to pull her suit all the way down to her low cleavage while not in combat? Its almost like she is trying to show off her chest, but to whom?

If I was a girl I would do that
Not for long.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=00060000000100030000,timestamp=2018-02-21T21:25:33.017+0000)
>
> Not for long.

?

When there are acid spitting, projectile firing, clawed, spiked, and vicious alien monsters who can become invisible around, you would want that protection pretty quickly.

I don't really know why you would do that if you were a girl, not going to assume though.
Honey trap strategy maybe?

Against whom?
Unless the void is a hentai,those monsters won't be interested in your boobs,they'd just straight up murder you.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=000600000001000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-22T00:51:51.570+0000)
>
> Against whom?
> Unless the void is a hentai,those monsters won't be interested in your boobs,they'd just straight up murder you.

Don't be so sure, Kai's symbiote suit is cradling hers pretty jealously.

It's so clear to me now.
They made it toggle on and off to pacify both sides. 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

She doesn't look void enough. 
"Toggle battle mode on mate."

When will Riot give us a hawt champion?
"Toggle battle mode off mate."

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MWxNTrEdMuU
Because she has since left the void, and wants sex like any normal human.
But... but... why would the Void Suit cooperate or even care?  Did it always have that function?  Why would it?

I feel like since she can remove it at will, she has some kind of telepathic control or communication with it.  It might just listen to her, in which case yes it always had a sexy function.  Though personally i dont think shes sexy, to catsuit, needs more modesty.  I like spell thief lux or Taliyah better.  And then theres Jinx who I find hot af.

If i had to guess with kai, her suit by itself is weak, when cooperating it becomes a weapon, the weilder uses it and it gets nutrients, so it acts as a pet to them, or itll starve.
Ewwwww, dude, Taliyah is sixteen.
I mean half this games playerbase is like under 18 lol

>What did you eat? 

Everything else.

> [{quoted}](name=DyQuill,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2018-02-22T03:45:31.977+0000)
>
> Everything else.

What's the chirality on Void amino acids?

Do they even *have* amino acids?  Do they even have *atoms*?  How alien is this place?

Inquiring minds wish to know.
Asking the important questions here.

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=001000000000,timestamp=2018-02-22T05:20:33.661+0000)
>
> Asking the important questions here.

Honestly, though, it's a pretty important question.

Riot brought (semi) real biology into the setting with their article on Vastaya evolution.  As soon as this sort of thing starts getting tossed around, questions like this become SUPER important.  Unless things in the Void are made of the same *very specific* biological building blocks as terrestrial life (and everything we've been told thus far points to a giant NO) then they would be as inedible as a pile of sand to Kai.

If they ARE made of the same stuff, then that just begs the question 'why are these utterly alien things made of the same stuff as life on Runeterra?' since amino acids used in living things are totally arbitrary; there are a ton of them that aren't biologically relevant due to sheer happenstance.  And that's even assuming they're even made of matter as we would comprehend it to begin with.  The fact that they evaporate when they die 'n don't respond to physics properly points to another giant NO.

So... is the suit processing this stuff for her somehow?

How did it learn to do that?

It's an endless spiral of questions that just leads to questions that are even *more* baffling.

I want to play a game with you. You only  have to answer two questions:

**ONLY RULE: You can only answer the questions using Kai'SaÂ´s IN-GAME lines and VO.**

1.-Describe Kai'Sa without mentioning her appearance or occupation (So can't answer "she is a hunter" or "she is a pretty suit wearing lady")

2.-What is Kai'Sa's goal or objective? What does it strive for?


---------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------
Here is an example for Swain

1.- Swain is determined, confident, cunning, wise, meticulous, arrogant...etc.

2.- Swain wants to unify, to conquer, to rule, to posses, to gain power and knowledge, to be prepared, to defeat....etc

-------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------

The longer the answer the deeper the character
You'd be surprised what one could find on the fringes of the abyss. And that's not makeup...
Interesting, what lies in this abyss of the void. Also hi Michael o/

> [{quoted}](name=Spideraxe,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=00110000,timestamp=2018-02-22T03:56:27.056+0000)
>
> Interesting, what lies in this abyss of the void. Also hi Michael o/

Hey, Spideraxe! You're everywhere. What lies in the abyss? A lot of things-- let's just say the detritus of civilizations past and present. And monsters. Sweet dreams!

> [{quoted}](name=CoolRadius,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=001100000000,timestamp=2018-02-22T04:05:49.439+0000)
>
> Hey, Spideraxe! You're everywhere. What lies in the abyss? A lot of things-- let's just say the detritus of civilizations past and present. And monsters. Sweet dreams!

Your teases are cool and all, but stop, give us proper Void lore.

And a reason for her suit to be so technological despite supposedly being a symbiote. ANSWERS! AAAAAH

Or don't, whatever >:v
Are we Dark Souls now?
Interesting, the void does seem to swallow a lot of interesting stuff but not necessarily destroys it, or at least of it
So like, every world the void's consumed. That would make her a kind of scavenger, reying on the voids continued destruction to survive.  I wonder hiw much guilt she feels?

Roses are red.
What is that sheen?
Maybe she's born with it.
It's surely not Maybelline.

I want to play a game with you. You only have to answer two questions:

**ONLY RULE: You can only answer the questions using Kai'SaÂ´s IN-GAME lines and VO.**

1.-Describe Kai'Sa without mentioning her appearance or occupation (So can't answer "she is a hunter" or "she is a pretty suit wearing lady")

2.-What is Kai'Sa's goal or objective? What does it strive for?

------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------
Here is an example for Swain

1.- Swain is determined, confident, cunning, wise, meticulous, arrogant...etc.

2.- Swain wants to unify, to conquer, to rule, to posses, to gain power and knowledge, to be prepared, to defeat....etc

------------------------------------------------------

The longer the answer the deeper the character
Well to be fair, she was just waiting for a time when mobility creep was so prevalent she could slip through unnoticed.  HEEEEEEYOOOOOOOOO.

Might be that her living suit, being a Void creature itself, consumes and digests their prey. It then feeds the human host via an unknown method.  
Or maybe they're fused enough for their digestive systems to become one, allowing her to survive off of Void flesh.

If ANYTHING is gonna turn you into a weird void monstrosity, it's gotta be "fused enough for their digestive systems to become one". The amount of contact she has with this ALIEN THING cannot be healthy, otherwise what's the point of the void? Anyone can live there if you wear this conveniently human-biology-friendly suit creature?

> [{quoted}](name=AbrahamBaconham,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zH7IpmHT,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2018-02-21T21:19:51.423+0000)
>
> If ANYTHING is gonna turn you into a weird void monstrosity, it's gotta be "fused enough for their digestive systems to become one". The amount of contact she has with this ALIEN THING cannot be healthy, otherwise what's the point of the void? Anyone can live there if you wear this conveniently human-biology-friendly suit creature?

I don't quite get why you're so aggressive, but the champion itself states that the creature is a second skin and she even mentions how  it's comparable to when your skin itches.  
So in cannon, the void thing isn't fused to her, it's "just" a living suit. By that logic, we can deduce that either Void nutrients are edible (maybe you need to build up tolerance) or that the skin creature eats and then feeds Kai'sa via skin contact somehow.  
Cannon isn't necessarily logic. Yes, them being fused would make sense, but they're not.

Maybe this could mean void creatures are indeed edible or there is edible plant life in the void. There must also be sources of drinking water somewhere. I have a theory that thatâs voiding blood to show how much of a boss she is, or itâs void pee to scare off the little ones, but might attract big ones.
